Class picture.directFractal.Maze 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----picture.PicPipe
           |
           +----picture.directFractal.DirectFractal
                   |
                   +----picture.directFractal.Maze
public class Maze
extends DirectFractal
This DirectFractal is the maze on the USAFA CS110 94-95 textbook cover This is an infinite maze that never repeats (quasiperiodic), with exactly one path between any two points (no loops, no unreachable regions). Each wall of the maze is also such a maze. The entire scene is one wall of yet another such maze. x and y are both in range [-1,1] to show the main maze.

This code is (c) 1996 Leemon Baird <leemon@cs.cmu.edu>, http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~baird
The source and object code may be redistributed freely. If the code is modified, please state so in the comments.
